features: What's Include - Our construction toys includes 200 PCS flexible track components, 2 race cars, 4 mini construction truck, 8 traffic signs, 2 trees, and a bridge. Advanced configuration for your little kids to build their own construction kingdom!

6 Different Types of Construction Trucks - We have configured 6 simulation engineering cars with unique designs and functions. Includes haul truck, excavator, road roller, cement truck, and 2 racing cars. Perfect gift for 3 4 5 year olds boys toys.

More Accessory, More Ways to Play - Race car can cross the bridge, and the track pieces can be flexed, snapped to form various different track shapes. Each truck has moveable working arms. Children can pretend to do all kinds of construction jobs with these trucks and will spend hours working on creative and imaginative play.

Create Your Own Road - Using the Y-shaped track, the arc tracks, and the bridge, this STEM construction toys helps your kids fly his/her imagination to build his/her own track world on there own, which help them overall develop, limit screen time, make time for healthy hands-on play.

Safety & Detailed First - Conforms to US toy standards. Made of toxic-free materials, safety always comes first. Each construction track is in a unique design and perfectly fit in kids' hands, portable to carry in the pocket to play everywhere.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Want To Help Your Little Car Lover Enjoy Endless Hours Of Playing Fun? iHaHa Upgrade Construction Engineering-theme Race Track Toy For Boys Is What You Have Been Looking For! Compared with other sellers, we have designed a 236 PCS unique engineering-theme track and equipped 6 cars (2 race cars + 4 mini construction trucks) for children to enjoy playing. Such a set of highly configured track engineering toys will definitely surprise your children! Children's Playroom Is Incomplete Without A Set Of Car Toys These construction toys for boys can not only satisfy children's obsession with cars but also can be interesting decoration. Moreover, it can also be placed in the bedroom, living room, game room, school and outdoors for children to play, which is very convenient to carry. Show Your Children Imagination & Learn By Creating A Road With 200 tracks and 1 bridge, you and your child can use your imagination to create a variety of unique tracks and then let the car drive on it. This makes engineering games more attractive and fun and can exercise children's hands-on coordination skills and improve their imagination. Gift For Engineering Lovers iHaHa construction race tracks have exquisite packaging, includes 6 PCS construction cars and a flexible track playset create an engineering road gift for 3 4 5 6 year old boys girls.

How To Install The Battery Please use a screwdriver to open the cover, and then put 1 x 1.5V AA battery (not included) into the engineering car to start the game. Create Your Own Flexible Tracks The flexible tracks can be twisted, turned and adjusted to form different shapes and accommodate any scenario and space. It brings kids an excellent experience, has great moments & indoor fun. Engineering Race Track Toys - 236 PCS - 200 Track Pieces - 4 Mini Construction Trucks - 2 Race Cars - 8 Traffic Signs - 1 Bridge - 2 Trees -19 Other Track Accessories

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Keeps kids busy!!!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. We have taken this apart and put back together multiple times. And it’s a new track every time! My son loves making the new tracks himself (he’s 4) the cars are great and require 1 AA. After 8 hours of use they are getting slower but still run great! The other construction items are mediocre. But to any kid that loves construction he says they are good work toys 😂 We play with this for 20/30 minutes easily!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Such a great idea for little ones. I would say that the roads itself are easy to take apart and put back together for kids around the age of five however, little ones are able to use it once the roads are clipped. It’s so nice to have the cars that can go by themselves however, one of our cars did not spin its tires due to a defect on the inside of the car. However, I was able to take the toy apart and make shift away to get the motor to run correctly. My son is obsessed with this!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great toy, buy 2
reviews.reviewText: My kids LOVE this set and it's a ton of fun but does have a few small setbacks which are just sort of annoying but not a major inconvenience. Firstly, both my boys got one of these for Christmas and if you are going to get this I highly recommend you buy 2. The amount of tracks as well as bridges you get is decent but when you have double it is perfect for some kids who like to change the track up or build bridges and things. It is super easy to put together and tear apart and easy for children to do as well. Set backs: the spin wheel it comes with has a place for 2 AA batteries however the batteries are slightly small so it doesn't work. I have tried new batteries and changing positions just in case I was doing something wrong but to no avail, however it works fine without batteries and I am unsure what the batteries were supposed to be for. The battery is the cars need changed daily, I am going to start taking them out at night, the kids are not leaving them on all night but when we get up in the morning the cars are all dead so I think the car is using the batteries up even when they aren't on which is annoying but again not a deal breaker for how good the toy is! My only other complain which honestly may be my own fault (we have 2 rough and tough boys so it very well may be us) one of the 4 cars broke within two days of playing with this toy but the other 3 work fine and it's not worth packing everything up and sending it back just for that.Overall I highly recommend this toy yes it has some set backs but the benefits of this great useable, fun, engaging toy far outweighs the cost of some of the small annoyances!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Kept the kids busy for days
reviews.reviewText: The kids love this! It’s fairly sturdy and easy to use. It’s colorful too. The kids could not stop playing with it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great toddler toy
reviews.reviewText: This toy was a huge hit. My son loves playing with it. Great quality for price. The cars worked great and went around the track perfect. Also a great size travel as well. Highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars One car doesn’t work
reviews.reviewText: One works and the other broke within 10 minutes of him playing with it. The signs and stuff that come with it are very cheap. The small construction trucks are very easy to break and could be a choking hazard. I have it 3 stars cause the track itself is build very impressively, literally that’s it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My 3 and 4 year old love to assemble and dissemble these tracks and have done it over and over. I like how they can easily snap together and apart so my husband and I don’t have to assist with assembly constantly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A MUST HAVE FOR TODDLERS
reviews.reviewText: I NORMALLY DONT WRITE REVIEWS BUT I WANTED TO LET PEOPLE KNOW THAT THIS TOY IS BEING PLAYED WITH EVERY DAY ALL DAY IN A VERY ROUGH MANNER. MY 4 YEAR OLD TWIN GRANDSONS ARE ROUGH ON TOYS AND THIS TRACK IS DURABLE, FUN AND A CONSTANT ENTERTAINMENT FOR SO LITTLE MONEY. WE TAKE THIS EVERYWHERE WE GO. ONE GRANDSON IN ON THE SPECTRUM AND HE ABSOLUTELY LOVES THIS TOY.
Esta muy buenoMi sobrino se divierte mucho con este juegoTiene dos coches eléctricos

reviews.reviewTitle: space compact but gives enough room for the child's fun
reviews.reviewText: Grandson was absolutely happy and thrilled. Thank you.
No es lo que esperaba se ve diferente en la foto de muestra
